mapper.select: SELECT a.EMPID, a.EMPNO, a.EMPNAME, a.DEPTNAME, a.DEPTCODE, a.EMPGRAD, a.EMPGARDCODE, a.EMPJIKW, a.EMPJIKWCODE, a.EMPHANDPHONE, a.EMPTELPHONE, a.EMPMAIL FROM slc_mis.VI_MIEMPL a
SELECT CODD_VALU as empjikwcode , CODD_DESC empjikw, SORT_ORDE sortOrde FROM slc_mis.tm_codexd WHERE CODH_FLNM = 'HR03' AND CODD_YSNO = '1' ORDER BY SORT_ORDE
